recommendations: Jon Boles
Founder & CEO at Avintiv Media
April 27, 2017, Jon worked with Chris but at different companies

It's hard to sum up my recommendations for Chris has he wears so many hats. I've been an entrepreneur for close to 10 years now and have started 6 companies of my own and have built over 60 brands over the years. There comes a point in your business growth where you need to drop your ego and ask for help. One of my businesses recently scaled up faster than we were ready for and left us with more clients than we knew what to do with, unorganized (although we are all OCD), and running at full speed just to put out fires and maintain our work load.I hired Chris for 2 full days of consulting and he has helped my business do a complete 180. He helped on the following topics: systems, procedures, on-boarding, management, process flow, organization, automation, and so much more.Within 45 days of completing my consulting with Chris, we have doubled our monthly revenue and increased productivity by 30% within our core team and workflow.I recommend Chris to any business who is starting out, at their revenue cap and needs to move past its plateau or simply just wants to streamline their business which in turn lowers expenses and increases profits.

Mark DiCristofaro
Producer, Line Producer
December 31, 2016, Mark was a client of Chris’

Before working with Chris and Organize Chaos, we had gaps and inconsistencies with task management and delegation.  When you’re part of a fast-growing company, it’s difficult to work on the car while your flying down the highway.   Chris came in and offered a fresh perspective within the context of our goals.  He helped us create streamlined processes, significantly minimize inefficiencies, and despite our fast-paced growth, we now have a greater piece of mind in achieving our company goals. He even put together a detailed action plan for us, which we've crossed many items off of in just two short months. I would highly recommend Organize Chaos for any business owner looking to streamline their processes and make it better than ever.

Anthony Sarandrea
Forbes/Inc Magazine-"Top References for Marketing Trends in 2017"​
December 13, 2016, Anthony was a client of Chris’

My company was in a position of rapid growth and needed the processes, documentation, guidance to scale and handle all of the procurement. I started asking around industry friends, Chris and his company came highly recommend from several business owners I trusted, so I gave him a call and hired him quickly after. Chris took an extreme hands on approach and was able to understand all issues we were facing (some we didn't even realize were causing inefficiencies, redundancies, etc). He then put together an actionable checklist of things needed to be completed/shifted in order for us to continue with our rapid growth. I can confidently say my company would not be where it is today without the help of Chris and his operational guidance. He has saved us countless headaches and allowed our company to break through the plateau we were facing prior to working with him. I will be forever grateful for the impact Chris has made on both my personal organization and business!

Beth Cochran
Co-Founder & CEO of Wired PR - specializing in content marketing and PR for tech companies
October 4, 2016, Beth was a client of Chris’

I recently had the opportunity to work with Chris...and...all I can say is, wow! Admittedly, I drug my feet for bit before deciding to move forward with working with Chris. Had I known how much an impact he would have on my business and even my mindset, I would've done it sooner. Every meeting was extremely productive. We actually took care of things right then and there rather than me leaving with a laundry list of things to do. He helped remove a number roadblocks on our path to growth. Chris is extremely efficient, with an uncanny ability to quickly get to the root of the problem. On top of it all, he's deeply empathetic and understands the unique struggles entrepreneurs go through – personally and professionally – because he is one.  I highly recommend working with Chris.

summary: I am energized by progress, and driven by process. Whether I'm creating or contributing, I love producing innovative ideas and making an impact by getting things done. I help people organize chaos.My experience as an entrepreneur, consultant, and speaker has afforded me the opportunity to travel the world, meet amazing people, and absorb diverse perspectives that continue to fuel my imagination.
